Getting intimate with nature

18 Nov 2012
  • do you think
  • if I strip naked here
  • I can get intimate with

  • nature

  • is it as simple
  • as stripping naked here,
  • getting intimate

  • with nature

  • I just want to feel
  • what the trees feel
  • and I want to

  • show them my love

  • I want to sing
  • like the birds sing
  • and then soar

  • up above

  • I want to get lost
  • in peace of mind
  • and the silence

  • of these woods

  • I want to stand here
  • vulnerable and naked
  • and embrace

  • everything thatâ€™s good

  • I want to take a seat
  • and meditate
  • and feel the pure

  • connectedness

  • do you think
  • if I strip naked here
  • I can get intimate with

  • nature

  • is it that simple?

/i-am /tears
